thread.title: England women Wicketkeeper Sarah Taylor makes history to play with men
thread.title_full: England women Wicketkeeper Sarah Taylor makes history to play with men

author: Dua
title: England women Wicketkeeper Sarah Taylor makes history to play with men
text: Cricket · Sydney, English wicket keeper, Sarah Taylor became first women cricketer, who became the first woman player, who is playing the first class cricket match with men. She became their first woman of the world, who is now playing with men cricket team. According to media, the wicket keeper of English women cricket team, Sarah Taylor played her debut first class match in the men’s team and she is now the first woman, who played with men. English woman cricket is pleased over her unique honor to play with the men team. Sarah Taylor represented North District Club last day and she played her first two days match against Port Adelaide. In this match, she did the wicket keeping behind the wickets. She said that she was feeling happy with her game with the men and she is learning a lot. She said that it will be her pleasure that the women players should continue playing with men players. She has played 8 test matches, 98 one day internationals and 73 T20 matches.
